properties.displayName: DNS activity ASIM parser for Microsoft Sentinel native DNS table
properties.query:
let parser=(disabled:bool=false) 
{
  ASimDnsActivityLogs  | where not(disabled)
  | extend
      EventStartTime = TimeGenerated,
      EventEndTime = TimeGenerated,
      EventSchema = "Dns",
      EventSchemaVersion="0.1.3"
  //  -- Aliases
  | extend
      Dvc = DvcHostname,
      DnsResponseCodeName=EventResultDetails,
      Domain=DnsQuery,
      IpAddr=SrcIpAddr,
      Src=SrcIpAddr,
      DvcHostname = SrcIpAddr
};
parser (disabled)
